k-anonymity.description: K-Anonymity ensures that each individual cannot be distinguished from at least k-1 individuals within the dataset.
k-anonymity.use_case: It is used to prevent re-identification by ensuring that each record is indistinguishable from at least k others.

Quasi-Identifiers.description: Columns used to create equivalence classes.

K.description: The minimum number of individuals within each equivalence class.
